author: dhruba
msg: HADOOP-2934. The namenode was encountreing a NPE while loading

author: jonesde
msg: Changed to be able to identify pks in related entities in the export

author: amassari
msg: - Use root instead of en_US as locale for built-in messages in the ICU message loader

author: vhennebert
msg: - Fixed the rendering of the area of a table corresponding to border-separation, which must be filled with the background of the table, and not the rows.
- Improved conformance: even if a table-cell spans several rows its background must correspond to the first row spanned.
- Added support for background on fo:table-column and fo:table-header/footer/body
TODO more testcases needed, especially tables with collapsing border model and tables broken over pages
